articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: EU's Call of Duty: Probe Microsoft-Activision Blizzard deal - BNN Bloomberg
articles.description: The European Union has launched an investigation into Microsoft's planned takeover of video game giant Activision Blizzard, fearing the US$69 billion deal would distort fair competition to popular titles like Call of Duty.
